title: Vivaldi - Virtuoso Cantatas - Jaroussky
description:
Vivaldi
virtuoso cantatas

Cantatas for contralto and basso continuo

Composer:  Antonio Vivaldi (1678 - 1741)

Performers:  
Philippe Jaroussky, Countertenor
Ensemble Artaserse, on authentic and period instruments
Claire Antonini (Baroque lute - P. Thomson, Bristol, 1997;   Theorbo - C. Besnainou, Paris, 1986)
Jeremie Papasergio (Bassoon - four keys - Bizey/Verjat, early 18th c./late 20th c.)
Emilia Gliozzi (Cello - C. Pierray, 1720)
Yoko Nakamura (Harpsichord - Ruckers school, with French-style extended keyboard,  Ducornet & Danset, Paris, 2004;  Organ, G. Klopp, Netherlands)

Label:  EMI Records, Ltd/Virgin Classics
Year: 2005
Total time:  1:08:02
Rip:  mp3 @ 320 kbps

Also see "The Making of &#039;Virtuoso Cantatas&#039;" on YouTube: 

Please help seed so that others may enjoy this music, too.
